title: test_datasets_datalad_org fails on appveyor
body:
#### What is the problem?

Since https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/2941 which introduced this test we got the failure, although it did pass then (https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/builds/19892298).  Seems to be related to introduction of v7 (started to fail [here](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/builds/19963437/job/gpudc71cnjh44yye) with annex 7. and preceding green [run](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/builds/19920699/job/87fwsw40qs2v0gkm) had 6) but https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/2975 unfortunately still exhibits it in its current shape

<details>
<summary>extract from appveyor</summary>

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.distribution.tests.test_install.test_datasets_datalad_org('',)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 818, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 592, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\tests\test_install.py", line 931, in check_datasets_datalad_org
    status='ok')
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 1208, in assert_result_count
    dumps(results, indent=1, default=lambda x: str(x))))
AssertionError: Got 0 instead of 1 expected results matching {'status': 'ok'}. Inspected 1 record(s):
[
 {
  "status": "notneeded",
  "type": "file",
  "path": "C:\\Users\\appveyor\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\1\\datalad_temp_4udmjxa7\\001-anat-scout_ses-{date}\\000001.dcm",
  "action": "get",
  "refds": "C:\\Users\\appveyor\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\1\\datalad_temp_4udmjxa7",
  "message": "already present"
 }
]
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.distribution.tests.test_install.test_datasets_datalad_org('/.git',)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 818, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 592, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\tests\test_install.py", line 931, in check_datasets_datalad_org
    status='ok')
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 1208, in assert_result_count
    dumps(results, indent=1, default=lambda x: str(x))))
AssertionError: Got 0 instead of 1 expected results matching {'status': 'ok'}. Inspected 1 record(s):
[
 {
  "status": "notneeded",
  "type": "file",
  "path": "C:\\Users\\appveyor\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\1\\datalad_temp_lqhcp78s\\001-anat-scout_ses-{date}\\000001.dcm",
  "action": "get",
  "refds": "C:\\Users\\appveyor\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\1\\datalad_temp_lqhcp78s",
  "message": "already present"
 }
]

```
</details>
